constituent: suspicious, Freud, state of mind, spool, clod, toilet paper, crotch, soil, dirt, ground
koohiiStory1: When you´re suspicious, your state of mind twists round and round like a spool of thread.
koohiiStory2: Imagine a loud farting sound on The Enterprise (sorry). Everyone looks around trying to find who did it. The one looking most suspicious is Data. His soiled crotch gives him away.
myStory: nghi ngờ. bí ẩn. khả nghi. tâm và đất nên nghi ngờ
readingExamples: 怪しい (あや.しい), 怪しむ (あや.しむ)
